room_title: Escape room "Santa's Sleigh" by Escape Room 207 in Brunswick
room_description: It is the night before Christmas and Escape 207 has teamed up with Santa to offer tours of the North Pole.  Visit the workshop and watch the elves busy at work.  You will also get the privilege of being one of the few to see Santa's Sleigh.  We just hope everything goes as planned when you arrive. We have never offered tours before and we know those elves can cause some issues in the North Pole.  So gather up your family for this fun and exciting adventure!
